Name: Saber Ship
About the game: Gradually gaining control of sabers and ships. You can choose complex aerialships, disorderly arrangement to demonstrate your superior swordsmanship. You can also choose colorful lanes, specialized engine to reflect your skilled driving. You can also challenge higher score records or beat higher-level 'cores' to prove your prowess. Every performance and intensity will be accumulated and recorded, and you can witness your every drop of sweat and every step of growth.
